## 🎓 I'm a CS student
- 👀 I’m interested in Python, Node.js, Web3.
- 🔭 I’m currently designing a news aggregator website.
- 🌱 I’m currently learning Node.js. 
- 👯 I’m looking to collaborate with anyone on any project.
